title: 6 Face Masks ELLE Editors Swear By
text: By Aliza Abarbanel Feb 7, 2017 Here, our editors share their favorite moisture-packing, pore-shrinking, humanity-restoring face masks that gets their skin as close to perfection as possible (i.e Cate Blanchett). SK-II Facial Treatment Mask SK-II Facial Treatment Mask Advertisement - Continue Reading Below I can disembark a 12-hour flight with a face like an old hot dog (as I often do), then slap on one of these miracle workers on for 20 minutes and presto—my humanity is restored. Not only does this mask, which is drenched in the brand's signature pitera, impart a certain lit-from-within radiance (see: Cate Blanchett ), it also moisturizes and firms, making it the ultimate complexion-revitalizing trifecta—and one of my top 5 most-hoardable beauty products ever. —April Long, Executive Beauty Editor Most Popular SK-II Facial Treatment Mask, $135; sk-ii.com Tonymoly Master Lab Sheet Mask This mask is uber hydrating–and since my skin can act like a sad, neglected sponge in the winter, absorbing my daily moisturizer so fast it's like I never even applied it, uber hydrating is exactly what I need. — Sally Holmes, ELLE.com News Director Tonymoly Master Lab Sheet Mask (Set of 2), $9; tonymoly.us GlamGlow Supermud Clearing Treatment Advertisement - Continue Reading Below When it comes to masking, I'm all about instant gratification. This tingly menthol-scented charcoal mask targets breakouts and shrinks pores (albeit temporarily) in just 15 minutes with a mix of mandelic, glycolic, lactic, and salicylic acids.- Julie Schot, ELLE.com Beauty Director GlamGlow Supermud Clearing Treatment, $45; glamglow.com The Body Shop Amazonian Acai Energizing Radiance Mask This mask is pretty, firstly, and smells good. If you saw it out of the jar, I'm pretty sure I could convince you it's homemade. So many masks I've tried have barely noticeable effects (and maybe it's just a placebo thing), but this one leaves my skin glowing as soon as I rinse it off. — Leah Melby-Clinton, ELLE.com Senior Editor in Branded Content The Body Shop Amazonian Acai Energizing Radiance Mask, $28; thebodyshop-usa.com Zelens Transformer Instant Renewal Mask For skin that's starting to look as drab as February feels, nothing works for me like Zelens Transformer Instant Renewal Mask. I smear it on, usually widely blow the 15min mark, and let the silky, sticky mask do its thing (it's thing being, according to the company, increasing oxygen to skin cells and giving a little cellular boost with marine glycogen and Vitamin C for glow). Not only does my skin feel uber hydrated, the mask is also gentle enough on my face to use more than once a week.— Cotton Codinha, Associate Beauty and Fitness Editor Zelens Transformer Instant Renewal Mask, $175; zelens.com Glamglow Gravity Firming Treatment This peel-off mask is amazing because of three reasons. 1) It instantly (albeit temporarily) reduces the appearance of pores, and also makes your skin feel simultaneously moisturized yet firm. 2) It's fun! This limited edition color is Sonic the Hedgehog blue, speaking to your inner tween. And 3) You get to recreate a Patrick Bateman -esque boomerang. — Justine Carreon, ELLE.com Associate Market Editor Glamglow Gravity Firming Treatment , $69; sephora.com More from ELLE:
